name: ssrp
description: The Simple Signal Replication Protocol is an application-level protocol with the lightness and speed necessary for distributed and collaborative information systems.

scripts.posts:render: find site -type f -name "*.md" | xargs -P0 -L1 -I {} npm run md:render {}
scripts.posts:update: npm run posts:clean && npm run posts:render
scripts.posts:add: find dist -name "*.html" | xargs -L1 -I {} npm run git:add
scripts.dev: npm run posts:update && NODE_ENV=test concurrently "npm run watch" "npm run serve"
